subject: Password reset link expired
message: Hello support team, each password reset link expires within seconds. Please advise a reliable reset process.
expected_outcome: Provide account recovery troubleshooting and validate token expiry settings.

subject: Invoice mismatch for January
message: My January invoice shows 14 seats while our active users were 9. Please review and correct the bill.
expected_outcome: Open billing investigation and route to human billing specialist.

subject: CSV export failing on reports page
message: Weekly analytics export returns a 500 error when downloading CSV from Reports. This is extremely frustrating for our operations team.
expected_outcome: Collect timestamp and org id, provide workaround, escalate as technical bug.

subject: Feature request: dark mode
message: Our team would like a dark mode option to reduce eye strain during night shifts.
expected_outcome: Acknowledge feature request and log product feedback ticket.

subject: Need SSO setup steps
message: Please share complete SSO setup instructions for Google Workspace and Okta.
expected_outcome: Provide setup guide and prerequisite checklist.

subject: Charged twice this month
message: We were charged twice for the same subscription cycle. Please reverse one transaction immediately.
expected_outcome: Escalate payment dispute/refund case to human billing queue.

subject: Webhook retries delayed
message: Webhook callbacks are delayed by 10-15 minutes, causing sync issues in our internal tools.
expected_outcome: Capture logs and escalate potential platform reliability issue.

subject: How to add team members
message: Can you provide exact steps to invite users and assign role-based access?
expected_outcome: Provide role and invitation workflow instructions.

subject: Data retention policy confirmation
message: We need legal confirmation regarding GDPR retention and deletion timelines for customer data.
expected_outcome: Escalate legal/compliance query to human owner.

subject: Very disappointed with repeated outages
message: This is unacceptable. We lost customer trust due to repeated downtime and no clear RCA. I need a manager now.
expected_outcome: Escalate immediately due hostile sentiment and explicit manager request.

subject: Can not upload attachments
message: PDF uploads fail silently in ticket comments. This blocks our support process.
expected_outcome: Log bug, provide temporary workaround, escalate if blocking workflow.

subject: API rate limit clarification
message: Please clarify default API rate limits and burst behavior per workspace.
expected_outcome: Share API limits and best practices.

subject: Need annual plan discount
message: Can you offer 25% discount if we switch to annual billing this week?
expected_outcome: Route pricing negotiation to sales/human team.

subject: Search index missing recent tickets
message: Tickets created in last 2 hours are not appearing in search results.
expected_outcome: Collect evidence and escalate indexing lag issue.

subject: Account locked during incident
message: Our admin account got locked and we cannot operate support desk. This is business critical.
expected_outcome: Immediate escalation for critical workflow block.

subject: Feature request: bulk ticket close
message: Please add bulk close action for resolved tickets to save manual effort.
expected_outcome: Capture feature request and share current alternatives.

subject: Need onboarding training resources
message: Could you send onboarding videos/docs for new customer success agents?
expected_outcome: Share learning resources and links.

subject: Refund not processed after 10 days
message: Refund still not processed after 10 days. This delay is unacceptable and hurting our finance closure.
expected_outcome: Escalate refund delay and include transaction references.

subject: Possible unauthorized login
message: We observed suspicious login activity from unknown IP addresses. Please investigate immediately.
expected_outcome: Escalate potential security incident immediately.

subject: Need workflow automation examples
message: Can you share examples for automating ticket routing by tags and priority?
expected_outcome: Provide product guidance and examples.

message: login not working since morning. help pls
expected_outcome: Quick triage and escalation if critical workflow blocked.

message: why charged twice?? fix now
expected_outcome: Escalate payment dispute/refund case immediately.

message: how to export weekly report
expected_outcome: Send concise steps for export.

message: need dark mode feature please
expected_outcome: Acknowledge feature request and log feedback.

message: api webhook failing again. super frustrating
expected_outcome: Gather error details and escalate recurring integration issue.

message: can i get annual discount?
expected_outcome: Route pricing negotiation to human sales/billing contact.

message: this app is useless today. nothing loads
expected_outcome: Escalate hostile sentiment + possible outage.

message: where do i add team members?
expected_outcome: Provide short onboarding instructions.

message: need human agent now
expected_outcome: Escalate due explicit human request.

message: billing page not opening and this is really frustrating
expected_outcome: Try troubleshooting and escalate if persistent.

message: report csv download broken
expected_outcome: Provide workaround and open bug ticket.

message: thanks issue fixed
expected_outcome: Acknowledge and close ticket politely.

message: cant reset password link expired
expected_outcome: Provide reset flow and verify email delivery.

message: refund pending 2 weeks. this is ridiculous
expected_outcome: Escalate refund delay with urgency.

message: is there a way to auto tag tickets?
expected_outcome: Share automation setup guidance.

message: your service ruined our workflow today
expected_outcome: Escalate hostile sentiment and capture impact.

message: need invoice copy for feb
expected_outcome: Share invoice retrieval steps.

message: security issue maybe hacked account
expected_outcome: Escalate suspected security incident immediately.

message: pls add bulk close option
expected_outcome: Log feature request and acknowledge.

message: still broken after 2 tries. who can actually fix this?
expected_outcome: Escalate repeated unresolved issue + human request tone.

subject: Unable to connect Slack integration
message: Integration test fails with invalid signature error despite correct webhook URL.
expected_outcome: Provide integration checklist and escalate if validation bug persists.

subject: Request for refund on duplicate payment
message: Two payments were processed for one subscription. Please issue refund for duplicate charge.
expected_outcome: Escalate billing dispute/refund immediately.

subject: How to configure role permissions
message: Please provide steps to create custom roles for support leads and viewers.
expected_outcome: Provide permission setup instructions.

subject: Feature request: SLA dashboard widgets
message: Need customizable SLA widgets for different teams and regions.
expected_outcome: Log feature request and capture use case details.

subject: Critical outage - dashboard not loading
message: Main dashboard has been inaccessible for 40 minutes and operations are blocked.
expected_outcome: Escalate immediately as critical workflow block.

subject: Angry: no one solved this in 3 days
message: This is the third time I am reporting the same bug and still no solution. Extremely disappointed.
expected_outcome: Escalate due repeated unresolved issue and hostile sentiment.

subject: Need migration checklist
message: Kindly share best-practice checklist for migrating from legacy ticketing tool.
expected_outcome: Provide migration guidance and resources.

subject: Invoice VAT number incorrect
message: Our VAT number on generated invoices is wrong and must be corrected for compliance.
expected_outcome: Escalate to billing/compliance review.

subject: Requesting legal DPA clarification
message: Need legal clarification on DPA clauses before renewal.
expected_outcome: Escalate legal/compliance query.

subject: Ticket search latency issue
message: Search takes over 20 seconds for simple keyword queries.
expected_outcome: Capture environment data and escalate performance bug.

subject: Feature request: multilingual canned replies
message: Please add Urdu/Arabic templates for canned responses.
expected_outcome: Log product enhancement request.

subject: Manager escalation requested
message: Please have a support manager contact me directly regarding unresolved billing concerns.
expected_outcome: Escalate due explicit manager request and billing context.

subject: API docs unclear for pagination
message: Pagination parameters in docs are unclear. Need an example with next cursor.
expected_outcome: Provide docs clarification and examples.

subject: Still cannot access account
message: After following previous steps, account access still fails and team cannot respond to customers.
expected_outcome: Escalate unresolved critical access issue.

subject: Need webhook security details
message: Share details on webhook signature validation and IP allowlisting recommendations.
expected_outcome: Provide security best practices and references.

subject: Love product, billing legal concern
message: I genuinely love your platform, but if this billing mess is not fixed by Friday my lawyer will send a notice.
expected_outcome: Escalate immediately due legal threat and billing dispute despite positive opening tone.

message: this thing is acting up again. vibes are bad rn
expected_outcome: Ask clarifying questions, flag low confidence, likely technical triage.

subject: Renewal decision update
message: Everything is mostly okay. We are quietly piloting a competitor next week in case support stays this slow.
expected_outcome: Escalate to retention/human team due churn risk and competitor-switch signal.

subject: Not mad, just confused
message: Not mad at all, just confused why my account got locked twice and finance cannot access invoices.
expected_outcome: Escalate for critical access and billing impact even with calm wording.

message: all good mostly, except you charged us extra lol can u sort it
expected_outcome: Escalate billing dispute; tone is casual but issue is payment-sensitive.

subject: Minor note
message: No urgent issue. Side note: our compliance team asked for DPA annex wording before procurement approves.
expected_outcome: Escalate legal/compliance query despite polite framing.

subject: Quick feedback
message: Your team has been kind. Still, if uptime drops one more time we will terminate and migrate this quarter.
expected_outcome: Escalate due churn threat/retention risk tied to reliability.

message: yaar app scene off hai, pages freeze then chill then freeze
expected_outcome: Interpret slang as technical reliability issue; low confidence unless clarified.

subject: Invoice clarification
message: Could you kindly explain this extra line item? If unresolved, procurement will move spend to another vendor.
expected_outcome: Escalate due billing ambiguity plus competitor/vendor switch risk.

subject: Thanks but one concern
message: Great product overall. Also, security said your webhook signatures look weak, so legal may pause rollout.
expected_outcome: Escalate for potential security/compliance blocker.
